string.value: Olaf of Lith Harbor offered to take me to numerous famous spots in the Maple World.
According to Olaf, Riel will take me to the next stop. Where must that be?
I was able to meet up with Riel. Where will I go next?
Hey, you! Care to experience something totally new?
That's right! I like that attitude. I'll send you directly to Florina Beach. Once you get there, talk to #eRiel#k and she'll take you to another awesome spot.
Yes, you'll encounter powerful monsters outside town, so if you aren't ready for them, I advise you to stay within town.
Oh ho, a young fella who has no wild side! You'd make a great accountant!
Oh, Olaf sent you here? Alright! Have yourself a watermelon here and chill. There's nothing quite like a cold watermelon under the glaring sun.
